metadata.title: CVE-2020-14475 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dolibarr 11.0.3allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML intopublic/notice.php (related to transphrase and transkey).

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
